text: The 2018 WAC Women's Basketball Tournament was a tournament which was on held on March 7–10, 2018 at the Orleans Arena in Paradise, Nevada. Seattle the winner of the WAC Tournament earns an automatic trip to the 2018 NCAA Tournament.http://sidearm.sites.s3.amazonaws.com/wacsports.com/documents/2017/10/5/2018_WBB_Bracket.pdf?id=5679 ==Seeds== {| class="wikitable" style="white-space:nowrap; font-size:90%;" |- | colspan="7" style="text-align:center; background:#DDDDDD; font:#000000" | 2018 WAC Women's Basketball Tournament seeds |- bgcolor="#efefef" !Seed !School !Conference !Overall !Tiebreaker |- |1. |New Mexico State |11–3 | | |- |2. |Cal State Bakersfield |10–4 | | |- |3. |Grand Canyon |9–5 | |2–0 vs. Seattle |- |4. |Seattle |9–5 | |0–2 vs. Grand Canyon |- |5. |Missouri–Kansas City |7–7 | | |- |6. |Utah Valley |5–9 | | |- |7. |Texas–Rio Grande Valley |4–10 | | |- |8. |Chicago State |1–13 | | |} ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size: 95%" |- align="center" !Session !Game !Time* !Matchup# !Television !Attendance |- !colspan=6| Quarterfinals – Wednesday, March 7 |- |rowspan=2|1 |1 |12:00 PM |#3 Grand Canyon vs. #6 Utah Valley |rowspan=4|ESPN3 |rowspan=2|722 |- |2 |2:30 PM |#2 Cal State Bakersfield vs. #7 UTRGV |- |rowspan=2|2 |3 |6:00 PM |#1 New Mexico State vs. #8 Chicago State |rowspan=2|809 |- |4 |8:30 PM |#4 Seattle U vs. #5 UMKC |- !colspan=6| Semifinals – Friday, March 9 |- |rowspan=2|3 |5 |12:00 PM |#3 Grand Canyon vs. #2 Cal State Bakersfield |rowspan=2|ESPN3 |rowspan=2|1,366 |- |6 |2:30 PM |#1 New Mexico State vs. #4 Seattle U |- !colspan=6| Championship Game – Saturday, March 10 |- |4 |7 |2:00 PM |#2 Cal State Bakersfield vs. #4 Seattle U |ESPN3 |733 |- |colspan=6| *Game Times in PT. #-Rankings denote tournament seeding. |} ==Bracket== ==See also== * 2018 WAC Men's Basketball Tournament ==References== Category:2017–18 Western Athletic Conference women's basketball season Category:WAC Women's Basketball Tournament WAC Women's Basketball Tournament WAC Women's Basketball Tournament 2018
